SEARCH
Package application.server

Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
application.server.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ClientHandler extends Object implements Runnable
Handles client requests and processes image-related operations. This class implements the Runnable interface to handle client connections in a multithreaded server. Responsibilities include: - Uploading and downloading images. - Image processing (e.g., grayscale conversion, blurring, edge detection). - K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN) classification. - Graph creation and similarity calculation.
